#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
 
using namespace std;
 
int arr[1000]={0};
int mark=0;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
 
void fact(int n)
{
	if(n==1)
	{
		mark=0;
		arr[mark]=1;
		return;
	}
	int p=0;
	while(p <200)
	{
		arr[p]=0; p++;
	}
	int t=n;
	if(n<9)
	mark=0;
	else if(n>9 & n<99)
		mark=1;
	else mark=2;
 
	for(int i=0;i<=mark;i++)
	{
		arr[i] = (t%10);
		t = t / 10;
	}
	t = n-1;
	int carry=0,pcarry=0;
	while(1)
	{
		if(t==1)
			break;
 
		carry=0,pcarry=0;
 
		for(int j=0;j<=mark;j++)
		{
				if(pcarry==0)
				carry = (t*arr[j])/10 ;
				else
					carry = (t*arr[j] + pcarry)/10;
				arr[j] = ((t*arr[j]) + pcarry)%10;
				pcarry = carry;
			
		}
		while(pcarry != 0 )
		{
			arr[++mark]= pcarry%10;
			pcarry  = pcarry/10;
		}
		t--;
	}
}
 
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	scanint(t);
	for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
	{
		scanint(n);
		if(n==0)
		{
			printf("1\n");
			continue;
		}
		fact(n);
		for(int i=mark;i>=0;i--)
			printf("%d",arr[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
}
